cast.name: 安德烈·塔可夫斯基 Andrei Tarkovsky
多纳泰拉·巴格利沃 Donatella Baglivo
多米齐亚娜·焦尔达诺 Domiziana Giordano
米哈尔·莱斯斯卡齐洛斯基 Michal Leszczylowski
厄兰·约瑟夫森 Erland Josephson
伊利亚·赫尔扎诺夫斯基 Ilya Khrzhanovsky

introduction: This outstanding documentary journeys from Los Angeles to rural Russia to investigate Tarkovsky's legacy through encounters with those who collaborated with him. Included are candid memories of the great filmmaker by his son, and reminisces by Bergman-regular Erland Josephson about appearing in The Sacrifice, Tarkovsky's final film. The film eventually lands in the forgotten city of Yurevets, where Tarkovsky spent parts of his childhood, including the years during World War II. The film offers a touching, highly personal and provocative record of the lingering effects of Tarkovsky on an extraordinary range of individuals.
